TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ISecurityEncodable

summary.span: 定義將使用權限物件狀態與 XML 項目表示相互轉換的方法。

span.span: Defines the methods that convert permission object state to and from XML element representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 權限的 XML 表示法用來描述執行個體的程式碼要求、 宣告式安全性權限集和安全性原則設定的權限。The XML representation of permissions is used to describe instances of permissions for code requests, declarative security permission sets, and security policy configuration. > [!NOTE] > 您必須實作此介面之任何新的權限物件。You must implement this interface for any new permission object. ## Examples 這個範例示範如何定義程式碼存取安全性權限類別使用。This example shows how to define a permission class for use with code access security. 會實作所有必要的權限的介面。All of the necessary permission interfaces are implemented. [!code-cpp[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Permission#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void FromXml(class System.Security.SecurityElement e) cil managed

param.name: e
param.span: 用來重新建構安全性物件的 XML 編碼。

span.span: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.

summary.span: 透過 XML 編碼，重新建構具有指定狀態的安全性物件。

span.span: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充安全性物件的自訂程式碼必須實作和方法，以使安全性 encodable 的物件。Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the and methods to make the objects security-encodable. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[Permission#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#6)] [!code-vb[Permission#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Security.SecurityElement ToXml() cil managed

summary.span: 建立安全物件及其目前狀態的 XML 編碼方式。

span.span: Creates an XML encoding of the security object and its current state.

returns.span: 安全物件的 XML 編碼方式，包含所有狀態資訊。

span.span: An XML encoding of the security object, including any state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 擴充安全性物件的自訂程式碼必須實作和方法，以使安全性 encodable 的物件。Custom code that extends security objects needs to implement the and methods to make the objects security-encodable. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何實作方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Permission#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/cpp/Permission.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[Permission#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/CS/Permission.cs#7)] [!code-vb[Permission#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Permission/vb/permission.vb#7)]
